HDG.ID.content: matter of thinking handed down in West under name “Being” > Heidegger tells us that Being of beings is genitivus objectivus; beings of Being genitivus subjectivus > subject & object stem from Being, so in either case we deal w/ difference [control genitive]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: matter of thinking handed down in West under name “Being” > Heidegger tells us that Being of beings is genitivus objectivus; beings of Being genitivus subjectivus > subject & object stem from Being, so in either case we deal w/ difference [control genitive]

HDG.ID.content: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance
HDG.ID.linkedContent: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance

HDG.QB.content: surpassing (Überstieg) is metaphysics itself, not a doctrine, but fact that such surpassing is “given” > given in sense of brought onto path of its prevailing, destined > destiny of (objective genitive [control genitive]) metaphysics: incalculable fullness/suddenness (unberechenbare Fülle und Jähe) of what unfolds as surpassing > acc. this destiny, human representation (Vorstellen) itself becomes metaphysical > the surpassing that returns to beings, “the transcendens pure & simple,” is “the being” of beings
